item.title: StanConnect 2021 - Cognitive Science and Neuroscience session
item.description: Online session of StanConnect 2021 The Cognitive Science and Neuroscience session of StanConnect 2021 will happen on November 19, 2021 5:00 pm CET (e.g., Amsterdam) / 11:00 am ET (e.g., New York). For more details about StanConnect 2021 see https://mc-stan.org/events/. Speakers Speaker name Talk Gang Chen Resolving the multiple testing issue in neuroimaging through Bayesian multilevel modeling Kendal Foster and Henrik Singmann Implementation of the Diffusion Decision Model with Across-Trial Variability in the Drift Rate Mike Lawrence It’s complicated: Some observations on the nuanced constraints of the multivariate normal in high dimensions Jan Göttmann Using computational modeling parameters to measure working memory processes Tentative schedule (times in ET) of each event: 11am - 11:15am: Introduction to the Event by SGB representative, Introduction to theme by Session Chair 11:15am - 1:15pm: four 30-minute talks - 20 minute presentation + 10 minute Q&A.
